name: AtlasRewards
description:
What is ATLS?

ATLS stands for "Atlas Token" and offers a unique opportunity to earn USDT (BEP20) in your wallet without relying on staking or locking your tokens. It is not necessary to connect to a website, and your tokens remain freely in your wallet. You have full control and the freedom to sell them or keep them, without any time restrictions.

How does the reward mechanism work with ATLAS?

ATLAS introduces an innovative staking mechanism based on transactions. Token holders earn USDT with each purchase or sale.

How many tokens are there in ATLAS?

The maximum supply (Max Supply) and the total supply (Total Supply) are 5,000,000. There is no possibility for expansion or minting function. Liquidity is set at 75% and is locked for a period of 365 days.

What are the fees involved?

When purchasing ATLAS tokens, the fee is 3%, and when selling, it is also 3%.
